name: slack-pokebot
description: Posts the location of nearby Pokemon to Slack.

PGO_USERNAME.description: Pokemon Go username used to log in.

PGO_PASSWORD.description: Pokemon Go user password used to log in.

PGO_LOCATION.description: Location where you want to detect Pokemon. Parsed by Google Maps so test it there.

SLACK_WEBHOOK_URL.description: URL of the Incoming Webhook set up in Slack.

LOGGLY_TOKEN.description: Your Loggly auth token, if you want to use Loggly.

LOGGLY_SUBDOMAIN.description: Your Loggly subdomain, if you want to use Loggly.
